import React, { Component } from 'react' import website from '../assets/icons/website.png' import mobile from '../assets/icons/mobile.png' import seo from '../assets/icons/seo.png' export class FeaturesBanner extends Component { render() { return (

Services we Provide

Website Development

Engaging websites built with user centered design at their core, optimized for all browsing devices.

Mobile & Web Apps

Building digital experiences that are mobile-first and optimize experiences with hybrid technologies.

Site Optimization

Auditing of current sites to provide feedback on user to customer conversion and search engine optimization.

) } } export default FeaturesBanner
